section.name: 3 - Acceleration
section.summary:
Objectives

By the end of this topic unit you should be able to:

  • Draw  and interpret acceleration vs. time graphs.
  • Add acceleration vectors to a motion diagram.
  • Based on the direction of the velocity and acceleration vectors of an object, explain in detail the characteristics of the object's motion at that instant.
  • Solve problems in which objects move with a constant acceleration.
  • Select a strategy for solving problems in which objects move with non-constant acceleration.
  • Use a spreadsheet to generate approximate position vs. time data for an object with a non-constant acceleration.
